Installation
=============

.. _PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/mlexp/
.. _source: https://github.com/volico/mlexp

**Install** the package by the following command from PyPI_:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install mlexp

Or install from source_:

.. code-block:: bash

    git clone https://github.com/volico/mlexp
    cd mlexp
    python setup.py mlexp
